Class SortingAlgorithms<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
SortingAlgorithms<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of elements in the array, which must implement the Comparable interface.
public class SortingAlgorithms<T extends Comparable<T>> extends Object
* This class contains methods for sorting elements in an array using various sorting algorithms, including Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, Selection Sort, Merge Sort, and Quick Sort.

    • partition

      private int partition(int low, int high)
      Partitions the array for the Quick Sort algorithm.
      Parameters:
      low - The index of the lower bound of the partition.
      high - The index of the upper bound of the partition.
      Returns:
      The index of the pivot element after partitioning.
